name: Locust Swarm
description: A swarm of bugs that get into every nook and cranny of the battlefield. Some even move any stones laid out or spin thicker webs to make them harder to avoid
effect:
- Hazard Moves that deal damage now always deal 1 minimum. In addition, Hazards that have a Chance Dice effect gain +2 Damage.
- Barriers instead increase Damage taken for the duration for those that aren't Bug or Fairy-Type
- Bug-Type pokemon gain +1 Dexterity for the duration.
